Text:
"This is an outrageous film..."

That has to be the understatement of the century!!!
LOL...you got THAT right, Fred...it's so outrageous it's almost surreal :)...

Oh, I forgot to thank you for your efforts and generous sharing!

While I already have this film, I'm very grateful that you put it up!

Why?  Because if people see it for themselves, I won't have to try to explain it to them!  In this case, seeing truly *is* believing!

BTW - I actually saw this in a theater when it first came out!  I really believe that I am still carrying scars from the shock.... ;)

Fred, I also have Mondo Trasho, Eat Your Makeup and Multiple Maniacs...they're on VHS format, and I've been looking around to see about getting them transferred to digital, but I can't find a source...do you by chance know of anything I can do?? I'd LOVE to put those flicks up, because nobody would believe their eyes....In Mondo Trasho, Divine is killed by a monster called Lobstora, a gigantic Lobster...it's unbelievable :)...if you do know about this, please let me know so I can get them up!

Strat

Can anyone please seed?? I've been at 98% for more than a week!!!
Thanks
I'd really like to see this one, could somebody reseed this?
Oh, please, please seed it! Reseed it!
Hi! Would you, please, return to seeding! I want to download it so much. Thank you.
